entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 7:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late this evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
